method.name: Center Nearest Neighbor Classifier

reference.ref: Q. Gao,Z. Wang. Center-based nearest neighbor classifier. Pattern Recognition 40 (2007) 346-349

generalDescription.objective: To perform a classification task by means of a 1-NN classifier, employing the center of classes as reference.
generalDescription.howWork: A enhanced 1-NN classifier,which uses the distance between train instances and centers of their class, as a reference of how far is the train instance from the query object.

method.example:
Problem type: Classification Method: Clas-CenterNN Dataset: iris (10 fold cross validation run) Training set: iris-10-1tra.dat to iris-10-10tra.dat Test set: iris-10-1tst.dat to iris-10-10tst.dat Test Show results: Vis-Clas-Check Parameters: default values
